data.name: AttentionDefaultSettings
data.value: Attention! Default SMTP settings are present.

value.p: The value mail.sn.hu for SMTP host name found in the configuration file (Web.config). This is the default address of the SMTP server used by several portlets and controls. You should consider to change it to the address of your SMTP host.

p.strong: More about how to configure SMTP settings:

a.title: How to configure SMTP settings - Sense/Net Wiki

data.name: MissingEmailAddressError
data.value: Please set your email address in your profile page

data.name: NoSubscriptions
data.value: There are no subscriptions for you in the system yet.

data.name: NotEnoughPermissions
data.value: You do not have enough permissions to edit notifications for this user

data.name: ManageNotifications
data.value: Notifications are used for notifying users about any kind of Content changes in the system. You can manage the settings of all your notifications for any content changes. You can edit, delete, activate or deactivate notifications here.

data.name: NotificationAddressDesc
data.value: Notification emails will be sent to this address.

data.name: FrequencyDesc
data.value: Defines the frequency of the notification

data.name: FrequencyImmediatelyDesc
data.value: immediate email when a content changes.

data.name: FrequencyDailyDesc
data.value: one email per day with the summary of changes.

data.name: FrequencyWeeklyDesc
data.value: one email per week with the summary of changes.

data.name: FrequencyMonthlyDesc
data.value: one email per month with the summary of changes.

data.name: ActiveNotificationDesc
data.value: Defines whether the portal sends notification emails or not.

data.name: LanguageNotificationDesc
data.value: Defines the language of the notification.

data.name: AttentionDefaultSettings
data.value: Figyelem! Az alapértelmezett SMTP beállítások vannak érvényben.

value.p: A következő érték: mail.sn.hu van beállítva az SMTP kiszolgáló címének a konfigurációs állományban (Web.config). Ez az alapértelmezett cím amelyet néhány Portlet és Control is használ levelek küldéséhez. Amennyiben nem ez az Ön SMTP kiszolgálójának a címe, kérjük változtassa ezt meg.

p.strong: Ennek a beállításáról a következő linken talál bővebb információt:

a.title: How to configure SMTP settings - Sense/Net Wiki

data.name: MissingEmailAddressError
data.value: Állítsa be az e-mail címét a profiljában!

data.name: NotEnoughPermissions
data.value: Nincs megfelelő jogosultsága a felhasználó értesítéseinek szerkesztéséhez

data.value: Notification emails will be sent to this address.

data.value: Defines the frequency of the notification

data.value: immediate email when a content changes.

data.name: FrequencyDailyDesc
data.value: one email per day with the summary of changes.

data.value: one email per week with the summary of changes.
